title: How to Make Banana Butter

steps.headline: Add well beaten eggs, lemon juice and well mashed bananas.
Beat well in a mixing basin.
Stand the basin in a saucepan of water on the stove, over low heat.

text: Cream butter and sugar.  Add well beaten eggs, lemon juice and well mashed bananas.  Beat well in a mixing basin.  Stand the basin in a saucepan of water on the stove, over low heat. Stir until mixture thickens. Use as required.
